summary: The customer is looking for a phone with the latest features and good multitasking capabilities. The Contoso Edge is the flagship model that has a 5.5 inch display, a powerful processor, and up to 128GB of storage. It also has an impressive battery life of up to 12 hours and supports fast charging. Contoso Wireless offers excellent customer support with a team available 24/7 via phone, email, or live chat as well as an extensive library of tutorials and FAQs on their website.
